title: A Photoshopped Response Sticks Up For China's Plunging Necklines
teaser: After a TV drama was yanked from Chinese airwaves so censors could cover up some low-cut outfits, snarky social media users have responded by Photoshopping coverings for cleavage everywhere.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
